column4: hi I use xubuntu 8.04 LTS and I want to upgrade to 8.10 without the net as I can't reply on the connection, I have the live CD anyway to update from that? or is there a xubuntu 8.10 alt CD out? if yes can anyone link me to a seeded torrent?
I mean anyone got XUBUNTU not ubuntu, guess I am in the wrong chat room..?
it's more or less the same thing, it just has a different desktop environment
